content: **opal** 1 is crocheted in the loveliest and soft twister solid yarn the pretty pattern gives it a fabulous and feminine look and it s beautiful in all the colors of the rainbow use the stole instead of a sweater on the cooler summer days or as a scarf you can decide the length of your work yourself **pattern information** the stole is worked in a fine and very popular classic pattern the pattern is divisible by 18 stitches **materials** 3 skeins of twister solid color 108 crochet hook 4 mm **yarn quality** twister solid hobbii 55% cotton 45% acrylic/ 100 g = 400 m **gauge** 1 repeat = 8 cm wide = 18 stitches **size** onesize **measurements** width 40 cm length approx 165 cm **hashtags for social media** #hobbiidesign #hobbiiopal 1 https //hobbii com/opal-stole utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=opal-stola+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
